account.description: Account the network ACL rule is related to.

api_key.description: API key of the CloudStack API.

poll_async.description: Poll async jobs until job has finished.

api_url.description: URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.

api_secret.description: Secret key of the CloudStack API.

api_region.description: Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.

project.description: Name of the project the network ACL is related to.

domain.description: Domain the network ACL rule is related to.

zone.description: Name of the zone the VPC is related to.

vpc.description: VPC the network ACL is related to.
